front.title: RTP Payload Format for the Enhanced Variable Rate Narrowband-Wideband Codec (EVRC-NW)
front.abstract: This document specifies Real-time Transport Protocol (RTP) payload formats to be used for the Enhanced Variable Rate Narrowband-Wideband Codec (EVRC-NW). Three media type registrations are included for EVRC-NW RTP payload formats. In addition, a file format is specified for transport of EVRC-NW speech data in storage mode applications such as email.
